issue.title: Task-3 Steps are uneven and to small

content.raw: Having a staircase with varying rise is a violation of just about every building code on the planet.  I believe there are exceptions for the entry step, but I'm pretty sure having the top step have a different rise would not pass inspection anywhere, and I can't fathom that NASA would actually build a stair case like that.
